description:
Uzumaki Subaru joins the Art Club with Usami Mizuki. Mizuki has a crush on Subaru, but he`s only interested in 2D girls.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mondai ga Aru Hito-tachi / Sayonara Uchimaki-kun
These People Have Problems / Goodbye, Uchimaki-kun
هؤلاء الأشخاص يعانون من خطب / الوداع يا أوتشيماكي-كن
問題がある人たち / さよなら内巻くん
